attributes.action: Spend remaining months on Peace and Reconcilliation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A plea for the Prime Minister to devote his remaining time in office on the advancement of Peace and Reconcilliation in all the trouble spots of the world; to offer immediately an apology for the invasion of Iraq;  to use the considerable wisdom and experience in Britain and other parts of the world, ignored in 2002/3 and since: (Mandela, The Pope, The Archbishop, Diplomatic and Military advisors,others), to assist with this task. The Prime Minister to lead this effort and therby render a massive service to our country and to the following generations.
